channel.title: BridScape (only server based on hybridding!)
channel.description:
[center][url=http://bridscape.host22.com/Webclient.html][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/30jtkiw.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/home.png[/img][url=http://bridscape.host22.com]Home[/url] [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/cliiiiiiiiient.png[/img][url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/rahbg4n9lei4c0p/BridScape%20Offical%20Client.rar]Client Download![/url] [/center] [center][IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/weblcient.png[/img][url=http://bridscape.host22.com/forums/index.php?/topic/2-the-rules/]Rules[/url][/center]
[center][size=12pt]Brid Scape™ [/size]
The Only Server Based On Hybrids[/center]
[center][b]Developer:[/b] - Tk
[b]Staff Team:[/b] - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN[/center]
[center][b]Support Team:[/b] - Cowboy - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN[/center]
[center][b]What is Brid Scape?[/b] Brid Scape is a hybrid server made by TK from Rune-Server it's a amazing pvp server just for hybrids including mains, zerkers and pures. It has a unique layout including shops and instant pking. You can gain cash by pking and buying items in the shop basically "upgrading" your gear.[/center]
[center][b]So is it Spawn or Eco?[/b] We have a few feature likes ::food ::pots ::welfare But that's the only free commands we are a small easy eco server not too hard to earn cash and not too easy, just perfect (Y).[/center]
[center][b]Is there any type of Pk System?[/b] Yes there is, once you kill a player within the Wilderness you receive 2 of the following items. 1) A Pk Token 2) 250K Cash 3) Random Pvp Drop[/center]
[center][b]What can i buy with a Pk Token?[/b] You can save your tokens up and buy items such as (I) Rings, Auras, Vesta, Chaotics, Dicebag ECT.[/center]
[center][b]What can i do with 250k?[/b] Well per kill you get 250k so if you save up you can buy better items or "upgrade your gear" at the shop.[/center]
[center][b]Random Pvp drops?[/b] This is a new pk system for edgeville once you kill someone you get a chance of receiving a random drop it could be any at your 1st kill or 50th kill you'll get a random pvp drops, includes statues or better items.[/center]
[center][b]Server Content:[/b] - Flawless switching. - Great combat. - Granite Maul. - Pheonix Necklaces. - Dragon Scimtar special - Bolas - Pk Ranks, With scoreboard - Auras - Clan Wars. - Duel arena on the spot!! (NEW). - Fixed prayers - 50+ Players[/center]
[center][b]Client Content:[/b] - 718 Cache - Low to HD in Direct X or Safe Mode. - Clean and tidy. [/center]
[center][b]LOOK AT OUR DUEL ON THE SPOT METHOD![/b][/center]
[center] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=K6HEbjy5TAk[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/1z1toxc.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34dius3.png[/img][/center]

Anyways, while that cache size is fucking ridiculous, your game-frame surprisingly isn’t completely inoperable like most servers, good luck.[/quote]

O yes it is sir.

item.title: BridScape (only server based on hybridding!)
item.dc:creator: @project-ufo project-ufo
item.description:
@project-ufo wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Home
Client Download! [/center]
[center]Rules[/center]

[center][size=12pt]Brid Scape™ [/size]

The Only Server Based On Hybrids[/center]

[center]Developer:

  • Tk

Staff Team:

  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN[/center]

[center]Support Team:

  • Cowboy
  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN[/center]

[center]What is Brid Scape?
Brid Scape is a hybrid server made by TK from Rune-Server it’s a amazing pvp server just for hybrids including mains, zerkers and pures. It has a unique layout including shops and instant pking. You can gain cash by pking and buying items in the shop basically “upgrading” your gear.[/center]

[center]So is it Spawn or Eco?
We have a few feature likes ::food ::pots ::welfare But that’s the only free commands we are a small easy eco server not too hard to earn cash and not too easy, just perfect (Y).[/center]

[center]Is there any type of Pk System?
Yes there is, once you kill a player within the Wilderness you receive 2 of the following items.

  1. A Pk Token
  2. 250K Cash
  3. Random Pvp Drop[/center]

[center]What can i buy with a Pk Token?
You can save your tokens up and buy items such as (I) Rings, Auras, Vesta, Chaotics, Dicebag ECT.[/center]

[center]What can i do with 250k?
Well per kill you get 250k so if you save up you can buy better items or “upgrade your gear” at the shop.[/center]

[center]Random Pvp drops?
This is a new pk system for edgeville once you kill someone you get a chance of receiving a random drop it could be any at your 1st kill or 50th kill you’ll get a random pvp drops, includes statues or better items.[/center]

[center]Server Content:

  • Flawless switching.
  • Great combat.
  • Granite Maul.
  • Pheonix Necklaces.
  • Dragon Scimtar special
  • Bolas
  • Pk Ranks, With scoreboard
  • Auras
  • Clan Wars.
  • Duel arena on the spot!! (NEW).
  • Fixed prayers
  • 50+ Players[/center]

[center]Client Content:

  • 718 Cache
  • Low to HD in Direct X or Safe Mode.
  • Clean and tidy.
    [/center]

[center]LOOK AT OUR DUEL ON THE SPOT METHOD![/center]

[center]

[center][/center]

[center][/center]

Read full topic
